Author: J.V.
Title: Really Nice  Wash Cloth.
Body: These are the fanciest washcloths I have ever owned. They came with a set of luxury hotel towels I recently purchased.I actually ordered these washcloths for decoration. I wanted some plush washcloths to roll and place in a basket in my bathroom. These certainly filled the bill. They fluffed up when I washed them, I rolled them, arranged them in the basket, then placed 4 white and 1 pale blue puffs at the bottom. They look like something on TV or in a magazine. Now if I have overnight guests, I can offer them one of them and they'll think I pamper myself like this all the time. These are really nice washcloths, well stitched and strong while remaining soft. They are thick enough to be plush, but thin enough to be usable. I can't stand a cloth that is too thick.  The washcloths are perfect for my bathroom d√©cor, they are versatile, and I never have to worry about linting. I recommend them highly, and the price is so reasonable for 6 nice washcloths.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2020
Author: John
Title: WOW
Body: I usually leave this type of shopping for my wife.  She usually shops at a big box store and brings home designer brand towels.  Don't get me wrong, they are very nice but very expensive. This was kind of an experiment to see if I could find towels of similar quality and save a few $.  I looked for towels with the highest ratings and followed that by reading lots and lots of reviews.  I chose Hammam, held my breath and pushed the Buy button.  They arrived quickly (thank you Prime) and to my untrained eye, they appeared to be very nice quality.  I popped them into the washer as per the recommendations on the packaging and anxiously waited to try them out the next day.  WOW, they are great!  They are very soft, absorbent and do everything our designer towels do.  My wife even likes them, WOW, WOW.  So now in addition to being in charge of buying LED light bulbs, batteries and other high tech items on Amazon I get to buy towels. WOW

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
Author: Dawn C Anderson
Title: Astonishling soft and absorbant
Body: These are the softest and most absorbent towels ever!  Very snuggly too!  Sometimes towels are so thick its tough to dry decently in small areas like behind your ear or on small children.  They are just a bit more narrow than our other towels and 2 fit perfectly on our towel rack without over lapping. They have been washed twice now and have not had any lint.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
Author: Samuel Williams
Title: Honestly: Spa luxury and quality - description doesn‚Äôt lie
Body: Bought this set of 4 bath towels and set of 6 hand towels.  I‚Äôve traveled to Europe, northern Africa and Southwest Asia - and these towels hold up to the ‚Äúspa‚Äù claim.  While they are relatively thin (consistent with most non-American hotels), that does NOT sacrifice softness nor absorbency (very surprisingly).  I have towels double the thickness from Target but they don‚Äôt absorb the water as well.  Plus, once you wash them, they fluff up, each time.  There is a little ‚Äúshedding‚Äù at first, but that is natural.  But what really shows the quality of this product is that at the middle of the end of the bath towel, there is a substantial sown-in loop so you can hang the towel. ü§Ø Amazing!  Also there is a contour stitching at the ends of the towel.  Usually when you wash towels that section of the towel shrinks but the rest doesn‚Äôt making the towel ‚Äúshrink‚Äù at the ends and lose its shape.  This has not happened after a hot wash and high dry cycle.  All and all - these are great towels and very affordable!!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Author: Eric D. Lindner
Title: Product as described
Body: After reviewing a number of customer reviews I decided on ordering a set of Hamman Linen towels.  I found the packaging was very professional.  The towels also had stickers that indicated they do quality checks before sending out their products.  I immediately washed and dried them.  As other customers have mentioned one of the towels frayed a little at the side seam and another had a patch of discoloration.  I contacted Hamman requesting that they replace the two towels.  They immediately refund the entire order with the objective that I order an entire set again.  I chose to order them again because other than those defects the towels are of good quality.  I found them to have minimal shedding, are soft to the touch, have good absorbency and dry reasonably quick.  Pictures:  (1) frayed towel; (2) discolored towel; (3) packaging; (4) washing instructions.

Author: Nick Q.
Title: Like a 5* hotel towel!
Body: My old towels were beginning to show wear, so I looked for a replacement. I decided to switch to white towels to make sure I could bleach them when needed. I decided on this towel after a decent amount of research. I am very glad that I did-- I can happily report that this towel is of a high quality.The good:1) This towel is extremely absorbent. It  quite literally "sucks" up water, which is in contrast to other lightweight white towels that I have purchased in the past.2) This towel reminds me of something that I would find at a hotel. It is very plush and soft. It is also very large-- I am a 5'8" tall male and I can easily wrap myself in the entire towel. This towel easily covers from the chest all the way down to about a foot past the knees.3) This towel washes well and does not track lint onto other clothing.The bad:** I did not follow instructions and forgot to wash this towel upon arrival. I often have stubble on my face (fast facial hair growth, smh), so I would get "fluff" stuck in my stubble. This went away after a quick wash of the towel. Keep this in mind and wash before your first use! I will admit that this is my own fault, rather than the towels' fault itself.Overall-- this is a "5* hotel quality" towel. I would recommend it for those looking for a premium experience.

Author: Cara
Title: Soft and Absorbent Hand Towel Can Be Used For a Variety of Purposes
Body: I am happy with my purchase from Hammam Linen.  The set of 6 teal colored towels I recently bought are made from 100% Turkish Cotton, as stated on the tag.  They feel soft, their thickness is a decent quality, and they are quite absorbent and ideal for many uses.  Some ways I have used them so far include: drying my hands after washing, drying my face after washing, drying dishes, countertops and tables.  A few creative uses include: during my toddler's bath time as a wash cloth, and even at the gym to wipe my face and body while working out.  So far they have maintained their softness and absorbency after washing them with the rest of my bath and hand towels.  The shade of teal is very pretty.  I would buy additional sets if they came in multiple color options.

Would have preferred to inform the company vs leave a review but there is no means of contacting them on my amazon acct.Otherwise, these towels were Exactly what we were looking for...super crazy soft and absorbent...at an amazingly low price.

Author: Clifford P.
Title: Very plush and soft - I bought more after I received the first order.
Body: I was a little hesitant to buy online without seeing and feeling them in person, first. I was impressed with how soft and plush they were when I first opened them. I took them out of the package and put them right into the washer and dryer. There was a lot of lint, which I expected, but they came out very soft and what I consider to be pretty luxurious. I bought some more and have been very happy with them. I think these are listed as Amazon's best sellers and I can see why. Top marks. Very nice towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2019
Author: RMC
Title: Real luxurious hotel style towels
Body: I really am so happy that I bought these towels because I wanted luxury hotel style towels. These are nice and big, super soft and really beautiful.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2020
Author: Karen
Title: Extremely Poor Workmanship
Body: The towels seem to be of good quality, but the workmanship is very shoddy.  I took them out of the package, washed/dried them.  I looked them over, but didn't realize how poorly made they were until I was folding them.  They are not cut or sewn even.  I measued a wash cloth and it was just under 11" on one edge, 11.3" on the other and 12.2" in the middle.  I measured one of the hand towels and it was 13" on one end, 13.2" on the other and 15.5 in the middle.  I can't return them because I've washed them. All items are like this and I ordered 2 sets.  This is the worst purchase I ever made on Amazon.  I've purchased towels from Walmart in the past and they line up and were cut right.  These are the most porly made items I've ever seen.  VERY DISAPPOINTING.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2020
Author: BixFan
Title: Nice Looking Towels
Body: These were packaged nicely in plastic, felt very soft and laundered nicely, but didn't look as soft and nice as before laundering. Came out of the dryer feeling and looking fine, seams are sewn tight and straight etc. they have a loop for hanging which is a nice touch. BUT when I used one to dry myself I thought they were very NON-absorbent, they felt "slick" like the water was sliding off the fibers. I hope they get better with use.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
Author: Beverly Gilmore
Title: These towels are soft and absorbent. Update.
Body: I was very skeptical about ordering towels without being able to touch them.  But, I was pleasantly surprised when these towels arrived. I immediately washed and dried and used last night. They were very soft and absorbent. The only problem I have is that I ordered white but received gray. I live in the country and would have to wait another week to be able to return them. I needed the towels so I decided to keep the gray since it would have been a hassle to return.  I would definitely order these towels again.Update after using. I still like these towels after many washes but they are not as soft as I would like. I wash according to the instructions, lower temp and no fabric softener, but they could be softer.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2019
Author: Kim
Title: Great Quality
Body: These wash rags are really nice, great quality and soft. I have washed them several times and the color and quality is still the same. There is no shedding or little lint balls on the wash rags after numerous washes.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Cool Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020
Author: Melissa McDevitt
Title: Amazing Value
Body: I LOVE white towels. This set is soft and absorbent, especially after washing! It‚Äôs a great set of towels for the price. They will be going on the main bathroom because they‚Äôre also pretty. Definitely buy this set.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Light weight and still good quality
Body: Personally I like a heavier towel. I didn‚Äôt read that these are suppose to be light weight. That being said, these are amazing light weight towels and they‚Äôre so good it‚Äôs changing my prospective on what a quality towel should be. Would but again. Survived first wash
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
Author: Ron
Title: WOW (HOLD THAT THOUGHT!!!)
Body: These "turkish cotton" towels are awezome. To me being a guy.. A towel is a towel, but these towels are what I would think it would be like drying off on a cloud.. LOL I washed them prior to use. I thought this would make them lose their softness.. NOPE, not one bit!I'm anxious to see how long they stay in this state? I really can't think of a negative at this point, i know there must be.. But I can't think of one!! I bought the "four pack" & the price was right, compared to the tarjay's & wally world's, etc. So as usual I'll be sticking with Amazon at least until those other stores can offer a faster delivery (it would have to beat out my prime delivery so they'd have to do same-day.. And offer a better quality product at a lower price. Since that is unlikely to happen anytime soon.. I guess Amazon is stuck with me!!Update (31 Mar):  Well I finally used one of the towels this morning after my shower and I have to say I'm SO DISAPPOINTED!!!  For some reason, it was as if there were 1000 little linen balls all over my shower along with what looked like a dog shedding with cotton all over my shower floor.  Yes, before you ask, I washed them prior to my first use.  Washed them by themselves even.  Now that this happened I just threw the other three towels in the wash once again.  I'm hoping this takes care of the issue.  I had to take another shower just to get all the little linen balls off my body.  I sure hope this doesn't happen again after the second wash.  For now, I'm taking my rating down to three stars.  After washing again, if I don't have an issue I'll raise it back to five stars, if I end up having the same issue again, well, then I'll have to discuss this issue further with Cus. srvcUPDATE (19 April):  It's been about three weeks since my last update and unfortunately or, depending on how you look at it fortunately, this will be my last one.  The first week of April I used one of the towels again after all the towels have been washed twice.  AGAIN, the towel was like a dog shedding.  While using the towel after my shower there were hundreds of "little lint balls" on the shower floor.  The good thing was that there were none of these lint balls on my body as happened in the previous incident.  What I can't figure out is that these little lint balls don't happen when the towel is dry and ONLY when the towel is wet???  So I washed all the towels TWO MORE TIMES.  Why twice?  Well I washed them twice by themselves once in cold water and once in hot water.  The first time I used the "gentle cycle" then the second time I used the regular cycle.  I then dried them by themselves.  Both the washer and dryer are only six month's old.  After putting more effort into FOUR TOWELS THEN I'VE PUT INTO ANYTHING OVER THE PAST YEAR, IT WAS ALL FOR NOTHING.  Last night when I used it after my shower, it was if I just took them out of the packaging as the lint balls started to fall off once again, but ONLY when the towel was wet.  So I only have one option and that is I won't be using these towels anymore.  I don't know if this was a FLUKE or what the problem is.  I think I've put in more effort, then I've ever put into towels in my life.  I've given it a "fair shake" and unfortunately the towels just don't live up to the standard that is put forth in the description.  I actually thought that after my first review, if the seller of the towels actually read these reviews maybe they might contact me. I think that if someone wasn't satisfied with one of my products I would be in contact to determine the cause & solution.  I was a bit surprised when I heard nothing.  So I was able to determine just how much this company was focused, or NOT FOCUSED ON CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEIR PRODUCT.  For those reasons I'm now downgrading my rating to 1-STAR and BELIEVE ME IF I COULD I WOULD GIVE ZERO STARS.  Do I recommend these towels?  NO WAY POSSIBLE I CAN HONESTLY DO THAT.  PURCHASE THESE TOWELS AT YOUR OWN RISK...I do hope this was a fluke but I'll never know because there HAS BEEN NO COMMUNICATION FROM THIS COMPANY!!!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Cool Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2019
Author: Cesar
Title: Holds up well in washer

Author: MeG
Title: **UPDATING REVIEW**
Body: ORIGINAL REVIEW BELOWNEW REVIEW:  Upping to 5 Stars, from 4. At first these were not very absorant and left fuzz on my skin when drying off. However, I‚Äôve since washed them 2-3 more times and now they‚Äôre great. I recommend them.  Just know that they will improve with washing. It took about 3-4 washes before these start absorbing well and they no longer leaves fuzzThese towels are soft and a decent size (I‚Äôm a size 10-12 and these are just big enough to fully wrap around my body). They washed well too. Only negative is that these aren‚Äôt super absorbent like ‚Äúnice towels‚Äù. When drying off out the the shower you have to rub a few times to get dry. I found this odd since it says 100% Turkish Cotton on the label. I‚Äôm not familiar with Turkish cotton.. is it different than USA cotton? Idk. For the price these towels are great though. But if you‚Äôre looking for the kind of towel that soaks up water droplets just by wrapping the towel around you (like a $20+ department store towel), you might be disappointed. Would recommend if you‚Äôre on a budget.UPDATE: reducing from 4 to 3 stars due to the fuzz they leave on my skin. I would normally rate his more like a 2 but they were cheap, so best quality wasn‚Äôt expected. I have been using daily for about a week. They‚Äôve been washed once (when I first got them). I noticed some fuzz the first couple times i showered but not much because the gray against my brown skin wasn‚Äôt noticed. However I licked my lips after drying my face and got a TON of fuzz in my mouth! Like A LOT! so I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs going everywhere. And will probably have my dryers lent trap full after every wash. Still doesn‚Äôt absorb well at all. When I dry my hands on them it is almost  like drying them on a fleece blanket.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Cool Grey

Title: 1 month of washing, no longer any Lint
Body: Decided to get some new towels and wanted to pay a little more for good quality. 4 for $40 with good reviews at least better then others. It seems like no one can make quality towels anymore. Btw the towel isn't even that soft too. Nice length and thickness to them but we'll see how much towel is even left after getting the lint off. Title: Fabric shedding and coming off after first wash before first use

The towels looked like the worst pilled sweater you've ever seen.So I tried washing them again, to see if it was a one time thing. No such luck. After the second wash, more shedding, more pilling.My washer is littered with lint from these towels, as is my drier, and still the fabric keeps shedding. I can't use them or I'll be covered in lint myself.They looked fantastic out of the box. Washed twice, never used, and they look shabbier than towels I bought a couple years ago at Target. I'll be returning these and looking at other options.

Author: L G.
Title: FAKE! Do NOT buy it!!!!!!
Body: I bought Hammam Linen bath towels before and they came with a tag with the brand....these hand towels, however, are NOT Hamman Linen towels...as you can see in the pictures, there are no brand tags at all!!! Just some information in Chinese and the only words in English are "name" and "size"...nothing says it is 100% cotton and nothing says Hammam Linen. Also, these towels are supposed to be green, like the other real Hammam Towels I bought...these, however, are baby blue even though I ordered the green ones. I asked for a refund and the seller says I'll have it when he receives the item, which has to be shipped, paid by me...I went to the USPS and they said "to China? Sending this to China will cost more than you paid for the product ". Bottom line: DO NOT buy these...you will not get what is pictured and you will waste your money on something you do not like...and you won't be able to have your money back. NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER!!!!!!!!!!!!

Title: Towels did not hold up as advertised.

This doesn‚Äôt look right when you try to hang them neatly so I folded the sides in.After the first shower, the towel dried me off quickly. It proved to be very absorbent. Author: Matthew Gonzalez
Title: Covered in lint despite 2 back to back washes. The reviews were so good. What happened?
Body: My 4 pack of towels arrived and felt super soft. I thought, wow these are going to be great so I put them in the wash by themselves as the directions suggest. After pulling them out of the washer it looked like they were falling apart but it was just really large pieces of lint so I thought, hey they're new, no biggie some lint is going to come off. I had to clean the whole barrel of the washer after putting them in the dryer because it too was covered in lint. Almost looked like mop hairs it was so thick.After pulling them out of the dryer they were still covered in lint and the lint trap had never been so full. At this point I was really surprised. I'm 40 years old so this is definitely not my first time buying towels, just the first time having an experience like this.The wife said send them back, they're falling apart but me being the hard headed man that I am and having read so many good reviews I said no I think I'll wash them again. I'm laughing as I write this because her I told you so face is still in my head. Sure enough they were still covered in very large lint balls. Had to clean the barrel of the washer again. Still covered in large lint balls again after coming out of the dryer and the lint trap again was packed full.What good is the towel being soft when you get it if it looses that plush after the first wash?This brand is a big NO for me.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Cool Grey

Title: Great towels

Author: Corinne Cruz
Title: Comfy towels
Body: Some people prefer new shoes, a new and fresh pair of socks, a new outfit. I prefer new towels. I have A LOT of towels and if I could, I would have a new towel for every week because once I wash them, no matter what I use in the washer and/or dryer, they seem to loose their "new towel feel". Not with these towels though! I have washed them twice and I'm still feeling the "feel"! They are super absorbent and don't appear to be wearing. They are still just as fluffy as when I first touched them, even after they hang dry in between uses. Hopefully they stay like this so I dont have to invest in new towels as often as I care to admit!

Author: Naomi 54
Title: So disapointed
Body: I purchased the bath and hand towels and I could not be more dissapointed. They came in two different mailings and the color and weave does not match.  I know, white does come in different shades. The hand towels were blue white and the bath had an ivory color.  They were not thick at all.  I could have gone to walmart and gotten better towels. They were advertised as Turkish cotton.  The label on the hand towels said china. WTH?  I kept them since I washed them and the prime returns locations are far from where I live. I am usually easily pleased but not with this purchase. Don't buy if you want to display towels.  They won't match.

Author: AO
Title: Soft but Strong Chemical Smell
Body: This product is very soft and feels good against the skin. However, it arrived with this strong chemical smell out of the package. I washed the towels on their own according to directions and used a fabric softener to try to remove the smell, which didn'twork.After drying the towels there was a lot of lint in the trap, but that is expected with new cotton towels. After washing and drying the chemical smell is still there. I'm a bit concerned but I'll try washing them again to see if the smell leaves. I use sensitive detergent and "natural" fabric softener for reference. If it doesn't, I'll be returning.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Sea Salt

Author: Sara
Title: Soft does not equal good
Body: These towels are horrible! I am so mad that I trusted the good reviews and spent my hard earned money on these. They are very soft but they do not absorb water at all. The dye job on them is terrible. They are grey and brown splotchy where the dye was bad. The lint on them after several washes is out of control and they began to pick apart and fray after the first wash. Do not spend your money on these if you plan to use them as actual bath towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Cool Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
Author: FGC
Title: These towels literely STINK!! - UPDATED on 10/07/2020 BUYERS BEWARE !!!!!
Body: UPDATE: I washed the towels on a low heat and they left an incredible amount of lint in the washer. Then I put them on low in the dryer and they left so much lint in the filter that I could not believe it. Please, DO NOT BUY THESE TOWELS. I wasted about $40 purchasing them and now the cost of washing and drying them. Needless to say they look like old beat up towels now so I THREW THEM IN THE GARBAGE - WHERE THEY BELONG !!After taking them out of the sealed bag I realized that they smell awful, and I mean awful! I even got it on the clothes that I was wearing and my hands. If you buy them just plan for them to be washed at least a few times to get the smell out. These are terrible because of that. What the heck is the terrible smell on them?? MY lord I wish I bought any other towels than these. Next time going to Walmart!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
Author: perpetualscholar
Title: Non-absorbent and Bleed like crazy and give off Lint like crazy!!!
Body: I bought four of these (light baby blue) and when I opened the package, the first thing I noticed was that they are very soft!  So, I put them in the washer (tap cold) with some other things, and one of those dye catchers.  Thank goodness that I did that because the catcher was very blue, as were some of my things.  I re-washed everything else with another catcher, and the only thing that was still blue was an old towel that I was replacing with these.  Then into the dryer - enough lint came off to make a hand towel.  I shook them outside and more fibers flew off.  When toweling off after a shower, they aren't as absorbent as my 10 year old Cannon towels.  UPDATE - Did one load of four towels and my lint catcher for the dryer was so full that lint was in the tumbler.  Bad quality.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Baby Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
Author: Renee
Title: Poor quality
Body: So disappointed!! Yet another Amazon product with somehow TONS OF EXCELLENT REVIEWS THAT TURNS OUT TO BE GARBAGE. The towels arrived and right off I noticed them to be very very thin! I hear ‚Äúhotel‚Äù I‚Äôm thinking they‚Äôre going to be plush and soft, durable. Not so. Then, I go to put them in the wash. I carefully pluck the ‚Äúinspector‚Äù tag off (a super tiny round sticker) and the weave comes out!!!! I stood there, so surprised like really? That little sticker pulled the towel weave out?? RED FLAG right there. This is why you should go to a store and put your hands on them, see them in person. I was so hesitant to buy these online for this exact reason!! VERY POOR QUALITY. RETURNED. What a waste of time and money. Going to a physical store for my towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Author: M3F
Title: Fluffy and Linty
Body: I've never purchased towels online because these are things you need to touch and feel so I decided to try here since you have reviews. I read many reviews for these towels and they seemed to be fluffy, absorbent, free of lint, etc. Lint is a huge pet peeve for me because honestly, who wants to get out of the shower and drag a towel all over their body that's going to leave lint stuck to you? I washed these towels immediately upon arrival to clean off any residual lint. I also rubbed them up against my clothes to see if any lint came off and I didn't see any. They're soft and feel nice, but now that I've actually used them, I'm not impressed anymore. I was covered in tiny lint that felt like I was rubbing salt against my skin when putting on oil/lotion after the shower. I HATE that. All the towels and hand cloths I got in this order went right back into the laundry again for the 2nd time. This is the last chance they will get before donating them. There couldn't be anything worse than lint that comes from bath towels, other than they don't absorb at all...and these are marginal in that regard as well. I wouldn't recommend them unfortunately.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
Author: James Fountain
Title: Looked great out of the box, then disappointing.
Body: I‚Äôm not sure if our set was just a bad batch but I can‚Äôt understand all of the high ratings for this towel set. One thing worth noting is that our set has a satin like shiny cloth between the ribs that is not the same as seen in the product pictures. Perhaps the manufacturer switched to a new company.On initial unpacking the towels were large fluffy and looked to be of high quality but a single wash ended that. Around half of the towels stitching cane loose following the first dry, the quality of the other stitching appears to be questionable.  It is very loose and then thread. Some of the towels became very rough others maintained some softness but they all lost their fluffiness. Honestly so disappointed in the quality of these towels.

Author: Slick1984
Title: Just what I wanted.
Body: My other, older, towels were becoming useless... as towels. They were the cheap towels found in cheap stores.I was tired of the thread-bare stuff, but I didn't want the ultra plush towels found in luxury hotels. These are just what I wanted.Not thin, but not too thick. They are of a good weight. It's a solid towel.Yes, all cottony fabrics shed a little during washing and drying, it's to be expected. I didn't notice the amount of shedding to be extreme.I have only washed them once and I am not seeing any detrimental effects as in unraveling or loose stitching. They still look like new.In my opinion, these towels are just right for my needs.My review was not paid for or coerced in any fashion. If this is in question, please see all of my reviews.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Cool Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
Author: Jaden LaBrake
Title: I really like how these towels work so far
Body: I suppose thickness of these towels would really be based on preference. Personally, I enjoy these towels because it‚Äôs not so thick it‚Äôs annoying, and it‚Äôs not so large it‚Äôs annoying. It‚Äôs also not so thin that it would get soaked after drying off from a shower. It‚Äôs not incredibly soft but it‚Äôs a towel so I‚Äôm not one to care about softness. It‚Äôs about what hotel towels might feel like. I bought these because reviews said there weren‚Äôt any issues with the fibers coming off when they‚Äôre washed or wet and that‚Äôs a deal breaker for me. I will not use a towel if that‚Äôs an issue because I don‚Äôt want to dry my hands or body on a towel where the fibers come off and stick to me. After the initial wash, I think all those loose fibers came off inside the washer/dryer so I think they‚Äôre ready to go. It doesn‚Äôt seem like any fibers will be coming off from wet hands or drying from a shower so that‚Äôs what I‚Äôm happy about! I won‚Äôt buy towels from Walmart because of that problem so that‚Äôs why I came onto Amazon to search around. These towels are a good price considering the quality, especially because towels at Walmart cost the same and the quality is awful.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Cool Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2021
Author: Peter Suslock
Title: Paper Thin Low Quality Towels
Body: Luxury Hotel Towels? More like PRISON towels -  I wasn't expecting to be bowled over, but yikes are these a disappointment. Flimsy and painfully thin, plus, they're full of loose threads and lint from a subpar weave. When drying off the water they soak up right away outweighs the weight of the terry cloth. If you've ever dried yourself off with a cheap towel than you know what this is like -- it's awful. They become sopping and drippy, slapping against you with a wet, clammy smack.Remember the hotel bathroom scene with Steve Martin and John Candy in the endearing classic "Trains Planes and Automobiles" ? these are those towels.They come packaged in plastic wrap, no box, no effort of presentation - if you're thinking of these as a gift, think again. Unless of course you're giving them to someone you dislike which in that case they're perfect. Opening the package they carry the perfume of rotten cucumbers - at least that's how I would describe it. I hoped after a wash they might be usable but no dice. When we bath the dogs we'll break them out so it's not a total lossIt's also worth noting that the attached cloth tags don't disclose the country of origin. If you're looking for decent towels at a reasonable cost -- keep searching because these aren't it.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
Author: Fly Fishing Lady
Title: Great towels for the price
Body: I have washed several times and do not have problems. I followed washing instructions. Warm water. These towels dry nicely. Very soft. I have a very expensive set of towels and one of them started getting holes immediately (Egyptian cotton). These have stayed in their original form. They dry just fine. I have not noticed any more lint than any other towel I have owned. They are a much lighter towel than the Egyptian one and probably do not absorbed as well as the Egyptian one, but they work great and more than half the cost. I have the sea salt  color and love the color. The color is like a very pale peach color. Very happy with this product. I will probably buy more when needed.

I don‚Äôt really like super thick bath towels as they‚Äôre harder to handle and I‚Äôve found they don‚Äôt absorb as well.  I‚Äôve bought much more expensive towels in the past and these work just as well and in some cases better.

They haven‚Äôt unraveled at all yet and don‚Äôt make an unreasonable amount of dryer lint. They don‚Äôt leave lint in my body when I use them. I did wash them twice before using them because that is what should be done with new fluffy towels. I bought 4 at first just in case they sucked but I plan to buy at least 4 more and will recommend them to anyone.

The worst is when you get out of the shower and the shedding on the towel starts sticking on you. Terrible.  Definitely didn't feel soft, nor absorbent.  I needed another towel to dry the rest of me and I'm short and petite! I was really hoping these towels would be thicker and of "premium quality" as they advertised. Definitely would not recommend to others.

Author: Conservative Texian
Title: Great Towels
Body: I purchased several of the large towels, hand towels, and wash clothes. Now that I've had them a couple months and have washed them several times, I can give a fair assessment. For starters they have held up great. No lose threads, very soft, and very absorbent. I am tired of bleach stains on towels so this time I chose to go all white. I wash mine with Tide free and gentle liquid detergent, Downy Ultra Liquid Fabric Conditioner free and gentle, and Clorox bleach. Then dry at low heat for 50 minutes. Even after several washes they feel just as soft as they did brand new. They are definitely hotel quality and I would definitely recommend

Title: Big Towel Soft Not too Heavy

I love them so much I am ordering more!I also bought the Hammen Linnen 100% turkish cotton bath sheets that are 40 x 80.  This towel is amazing but I returned it  because although very plush, it is too big and too heavy.  It seem more like a blanket that a towel.  It has a hanging loop but I wouldn't dare hang the towel on my towel hook  because I think the weight would pull the hook off the wall and it is so big that 2 towels would fill a full load in my washer.

Title: Doesn't dry very well.

However once they are wet they hold moisture and are probably very susceptible to mildew. Takes extra long to dry these. I got the smallest bath towel size and they are still bigger than what I'm used to.I figured I'd go high quality for my next towels but I expected these to perform better. I will update after a few more washes if the drying gets better.

I tried to cut them all away but gave up. For that price, that should not be happening. Such a disappointment, especially since it received so many great reviews!  How?, is my question. Luckily I had left one of the hand towels next to the sink and figured "hey, I can probably dry off *enough* to  walk through the hallways without leaving a wet trail behind me".Wrong. I was able to COMPLETELY dry myself with nothing more than the hand towel (ignoring my hair of course). I was absolutely amazed at how well a towel that was 1/4 of the size of the actual bath towel could work in a pinch. Worth every penny

Author: Jeremy
Title: They're nothing special, just ordinary towels
Body: Based on other reviews I thought these were going to be something really nice as far as towels go. They're a standard towel. Nothing special about them. They're not any softer than any other towel you can get for a few dollars and they seem pretty small. Wish I had known they were so mediocre, I would have spent the money on something else entirely. Also, when I first got them they had a terrible smell to them, almost moldy. They have no mold or anything on them but I imagine they were probably packaged up a bit early or maybe they just have a strange smell from the factory that made them. Either way, they're okay but certainly nothing like most reviewers are making them out to be. They deserve the 3 star rating I gave them.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Cool Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
Author: Kirsten
Title: Two very thin bath sheets per order.
Body: I asked the forum how many towels were in the bath sheet(s) order and received several different, contradictory answers. I imagine because the seller changes their manufacture sourcing. So, this review relates to June 2021:There are two bath sheets (70‚Äù size) per order.The slate blue is more akin to a cheaply, though overly pigmented baby blue than the grey blue described.They are super thin. Think Dollar Store beach towel thin.That said, they‚Äôve survived the washing machine and are a good value, if you don‚Äôt mind thin towels (I don‚Äôt).
